content: easy fun different unusual and eye-catching pattern unicorn dreams will look gorgeous no matter how many colors you use you can use one two or several solid colors as well as self-striping yarn better shorter color changes or variegated yarn with longer color changes like stylecraft merry go round papatya batik hayfield spirit lion brand ferris wheel iceyarns baby batik or magic baby and similar if you do not feel confident with color changes use variegated or self-striping yarn **enjoy the retirement this pattern is available now as a free download** experience level advanced beginner language and terminology english us technique short-row crochet the pattern includes detailed descriptions pictures of the final result a short video tutorial to demonstrate technique stitches & abbreviations chain/chs chain/chains st/sts stitch/stitches r/rs row/row single_crochet single_crochet decline single_crochet decline single_crochet - explained in the pattern colors colors used for the pattern sample deramores studio baby seashell color a deramores studio baby other colors but a blossom buttercup lagoon orchid peppermint yarn hook & approximate size unicorn dreams pattern sample was created using the following yarn yarn deramores studio baby yarn weight #3 light/dk fiber content 100 % acrylic hook size clover amour 4 mm sample size and shape rectangle 69 x 84 cm 27 2 x 33 1 in amount of yarn used for pattern sample seashell 100 g 270 m / 295 yrds blossom 60 g 162 m / 177 yrds buttercup 60 g 162 m / 177 yrds lagoon 45 g 122 m / 133 yrds orchid 70 g 189 m /207 yrds peppermint 80 g 216 m /236 yrds you can use any yarn & appropriate hook size that suits your project to be the project in its best i advice to use a soft yarn
